TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyTranslator(object host, string propertyName, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTranslator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PropertyTranslator(host As Object, propertyName As String, value As Object)
public delegate void PropertyTranslator(System::Object ^ host, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ value);
type PropertyTranslator = delegate of obj * string * obj -> unit

param.name: host
param.span: Controllo host di cui viene mappata la proprietà.

span.span: The host control whose property is being mapped.

param.span: Il controllo host può essere o o .

span.span: The host control is either a or an .

param.name: propertyName
param.span: Nome della proprietà che viene tradotta.

span.span: The name of the property being translated.
The new value of the property.

summary.span: Fornisce una funzione di conversione per la proprietà mappata del controllo host.

span.span: Provides a translation function for a mapped property of the host control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il delegato viene usato per il classe per implementare il mapping di proprietà tra [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].The delegate is used by the class to implement property mapping between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. Per altre informazioni, vedere [Mapping di proprietà di Windows Form e WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
